articles.author: Britney Nguyen, Christine Ji
articles.title: Trump’s crusade against Big Tech’s energy spending highlights a problem with no easy answers - MarketWatch
articles.description: ‘It’s not something that can be solved overnight’: AI has overwhelmed the electricity grid, and everyone from average Americans to Trump is outraged
articles.content: In the race to build artificial intelligence, Big Tech companies have spent record-breaking amounts of money on building data centers. Now, they might end up spending even more as they face unprecede… [+470 chars]
